description: Default features for the grapheme dataset

features.description: Lowest two digits: Rough estimate of how much of the grapheme is missing or damaged. Higher digits, between 1-9, signify which parts are damaged (1 is upper left, 2 is upper mid, ...)
On what line of the artefact is this grapheme found?
Very subjective estimate, in the range 0-100, of how uncertain the annotator was about the grapheme
